Integration

Sing app is a part of a solution provided by Flatlogic

We can connect admin dashboard with such systems as your accountign software, your custorem relationship management (CRM) system, your email system, your website analytics program, etc. Integration pulls all this information into one place so you don't have to log into multiple systems.
